objectives.name: Corner the Market
objectives.condition: Control 4 planets that each have the same planet trait

objectives.name: Develop Weaponry
objectives.condition: Own 2 unit upgrade technologies

objectives.name: Diversify Research
objectives.condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 2 colors

objectives.name: Erect a Monument
objectives.condition: Spend 8 resources

objectives.name: Expand Borders
objectives.condition: Control 6 planets in non-home systems

objectives.name: Found Research Outposts
objectives.condition: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties

objectives.name: Intimidate Council
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 2 systems that are adjacent to Mecatol Rex's System

objectives.name: Lead From the Front
objectives.condition: Spend a total of 3 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

objectives.name: Negotiate Trade Routes
objectives.condition: Spend 5 trade goods

objectives.name: Sway the Council
objectives.condition: Spend 8 influence

objectives.name: Centralize Galactic Trade
objectives.condition: Spend 10 trade goods

objectives.name: Conquer the Weak
objectives.condition: Control 1 planet that is in another player's home system

objectives.name: Form Galactic Brain Trust
objectives.condition: Control 5 planets that have technology specialties

objectives.name: Found a Golden Age
objectives.condition: Spend 16 resources

objectives.name: Galvanize the People
objectives.condition: Spend a total of 6 tokens from your tactic and/or strategy pools

objectives.name: Manipulate Galactic Law
objectives.condition: Spend 16 influence

objectives.name: Master the Sciences
objectives.condition: Own 2 technologies in each of 4 colors

objectives.name: Revolutionize Warfare
objectives.condition: Own 3 unit upgrade technologies

objectives.name: Subdue the Galaxy
objectives.condition: Control 11 planets in non-home systems

objectives.name: Unify the Colonies
objectives.condition: Control 6 planets that each have the same planet trait

objectives.name: Destroy Their Greatest Ship
objectives.condition: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship

objectives.name: Make an Example of Their World
objectives.condition: Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet

objectives.name: Spark a Rebellion
objectives.condition: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points

objectives.name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
objectives.condition: Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system

objectives.name: Unveil Flagship
objectives.condition: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat

objectives.name: Adapt New Strategies
objectives.condition: Own 2 faction technologies. (Valefar Assimilator technologies do not count toward this objective)

objectives.name: Become the Gatekeeper
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole

objectives.name: Control the Region
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems

objectives.name: Cut Supply Lines
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock

objectives.name: Establish a Perimeter
objectives.condition: Have 4 PDS units on the game board

objectives.name: Forge an Alliance
objectives.condition: Control 4 cultural planets

objectives.name: Form a Spy Network
objectives.condition: Discard 5 action Cards

objectives.name: Fuel the War Machine
objectives.condition: Have 3 space docks on the game board

objectives.name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
objectives.condition: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board

objectives.name: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly

objectives.name: Master the Laws of Physics
objectives.condition: Own 4 technologies of the same color

objectives.name: Mine Rare Metals
objectives.condition: Control 4 hazardous planets

objectives.name: Monopolize Production
objectives.condition: Control 4 industrial planets

objectives.name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
objectives.condition: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system

objectives.name: Threaten Enemies
objectives.condition: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system

objectives.name: Amass wealth
objectives.condition: Spend 3 influence, 3 resources and 3 trade goods.

objectives.name: Build Defenses
objectives.condition: Have 4 or more structures (on the game board).

objectives.name: Discover Lost Outposts
objectives.condition: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

objectives.name: Engineer a Marvel
objectives.condition: Have your flagship or a war sun on the game board.

objectives.name: Explore Deep Space
objectives.condition: Have units in 3 systems that do not contain planets.

objectives.name: Improve Infrastructure
objectives.condition: Have structures on 3 planets outside of your home system.

objectives.name: Make History
objectives.condition: Have units in 2 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex or anomalies.

objectives.name: Populate the Outer Rim
objectives.condition: Have units in 3 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system).

objectives.name: Push Boundaries
objectives.condition: Control more planets than each of 2 of your neighbors.

objectives.name: Raise a Fleet
objectives.condition: Have 5 or more non-fighter ships in one system.

objectives.name: Achieve Supremacy
objectives.condition: Have your flagship or a war sun in another player's home system or the Mecatol Rex system.

objectives.name: Become a Legend
objectives.condition: Have units in 4 systems that contain legendary planets, Mecatol Rex, or anomalies.

objectives.name: Command an Armada
objectives.condition: Have 8 or more non-fighter ships in 1 system.

objectives.name: Construct Massive Cities
objectives.condition: Have 7 or more structures (on the game board).

objectives.name: Control the Borderlands
objectives.condition: Have units in 5 systems on the edge of the game board (other than your home system).

objectives.name: Hold Vast Reserves
objectives.condition: Spend 6 influence, 6 resources and 6 trade goods.

objectives.name: Patrol Vast Territories
objectives.condition: Have units in 5 systems that do not contain planets.

objectives.name: Protect the Border
objectives.condition: Have structures on 5 planets outside of your home system.

objectives.name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
objectives.condition: Control 3 planets that have attachments.

objectives.name: Rule Distant Lands
objectives.condition: Control 2 planets that are each in or adjacent to a different, other player's home system.

objectives.name: Become a Martyr
objectives.condition: Lose control of a planet in a home system.

objectives.name: Betray a Friend
objectives.condition: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action.

objectives.name: Brave the Void
objectives.condition: Win a combat in an anomaly.

objectives.name: Darken the Skies
objectives.condition: Win a combat in another player's home system.

objectives.name: Demonstrate Your Power
objectives.condition: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

objectives.name: Fight With Precision
objectives.condition: Use ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.

objectives.name: Prove Endurance
objectives.condition: Be the last player to pass during a game round.

objectives.name: Defy Space and Time
objectives.condition: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

objectives.name: Destroy Heretical Works
objectives.condition: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.

objectives.name: Establish Hegemony
objectives.condition: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

objectives.name: Foster Cohesion
objectives.condition: Be neighbors with all other players.

objectives.name: Hoard Raw Materials
objectives.condition: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

objectives.name: Mechanize The Military
objectives.condition: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.

objectives.name: Occupy The Fringe
objectives.condition: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.

objectives.name: Produce En Masse
objectives.condition: Have units with a combined PRODUCTION value of at least 8 in a single system.

objectives.name: Seize An Icon
objectives.condition: Control a legendary planet.

objectives.name: Stake your Claim
objectives.condition: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

objectives.name: Strengthen Bonds
objectives.condition: Have another player's promissory note in your play area.

objectives.name: Dictate Policy
objectives.condition: There are 3 or more laws in play

objectives.name: Drive the Debate
objectives.condition: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.
